thread.title: Sunflower maze draws tourists to Philippines

title: Sunflower maze draws tourists to Philippines
text:
Sunflower maze draws tourists to Philippines 9:34pm IST - 01:33 
A sunflower maze in the northern Philippines is drawing hundreds of tourists every weekend, as the country officially starts its dry or summer season. Rough cut (no reporter narration), ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
